type: Remotely Operated Underwater Vehicle and Accessories
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
================================
**Procurement Notification**

## Tender Information

* **Tender Reference**: WS3968939159-Doc3968988321
* **Tender Title (English)**: F4760-220823 - Remotely Operated Underwater Vehicle and Accessories
* **Tender Title (French)**: F4760-220823 - Véhicule sous-marin téléguidé et accessoires
* **Publication Date**: April 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 30, 2023 (14:00:00 EST)

## Solicitation Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of a small off-the-shelf Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV) and related accessories. The procurement is for Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Gulf Region, to support the inspection of fishways, hydroelectric dams, and tidal control structures.

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Moncton
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: LeBlanc, Kristelle (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Description

The Government of Canada requires the supply and delivery of a small off-the-shelf Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV) and related accessories to support the inspection of:

* Fishways
* Hydroelectric dams
* Tidal control structures

The specified ROV must be specifically designed for underwater inspection and capable of navigating tight spaces.

## Export Compliance

The Government of Canada applies the goods and services controls listed in the Export and Import Permits Act to this procurement.

## Amended Solicitation

This solicitation has undergone three amendments.

## Additional Information

Please visit the Government of Canada's Procurement website at [http://buyandsell.gc.ca](http://buyandsell.gc.ca) for more information on this procurement. You can also contact the Contracting Authority: Department of Public
